name: Love
summary: Love is a unique and addictive high-score game where you risk getting hurt to gather happiness. It features a fully interactive soundtrack that is entirely directed by the player’s actions (there’s no “background track”, everything you hear is the result of what you do), which is why I strongly suggest you play it with sound ON, headphones being the best :) — NEW VERSION UP ON KONGREGATE : http://t.co/QHBAHG8
